title: I have 2 losses in my promos, but I've only lost 1 match in my past 5 matches... what..
body: Title, just wondering why if there's any explanation for this ?

replies.body: never mind, my internet cut out during champ select previously im guessing that counts as a loss... awesome........
Ya, sorry. Dodging during your promos counts as an automatic loss, and will also forfeit your Promo Helper win (if applicable).
